title: By the King and Queen, a declaration requiring all officers and soldiers to observe strict discipline, and for payment of quarters. William R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd; printers to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties,
notes: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the third day of December, 1691. In the third year of Our reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
